heading: 2 Exploring data
text:
unit focuses data visualization data wrangling.
Specifically cover fundamentals data data visualization, confounding variables, Simpson’s paradox well concept tidy data, data import, data cleaning, data curation.
end unit web scraping introduce idea iteration preparation next unit.
Also unit students introduced toolkit: R, RStudio, R Markdown, Git, GitHub.

heading: 3 Data science ethics
text:
unit touches data science ethics, specifically issues misrepresentation data results, data privacy, algorithmic bias.
Course lectures supplemented “guest lectures” domain experts.

heading: 4 Making rigorous conclusions
text:
part introduce modelling statistical inference making data-based conclusions.
discuss building, interpreting, selecting models, visualizing interaction effects, prediction model validation.
Statistical inference introduced simulation based perspective, Central Limit Theorem discussed briefly lay foundation future coursework statistics.

heading: Access

access computing resources introductory data science courses offered Duke University Department Statistical Science, go Duke Container Manager website, cmgr.oit.duke.edu/containers.first time accessing containers, click reserve STA198-199 Reservations available menu right.
need , , ’ll see container moved reservations menu left.Next, click STA198-199 reservations access RStudio instance ’ll use course.

heading: Troubleshooting
text:
’re difficulty launcging RStudio session reserved container, go status.oit.duke.edu scroll Teaching Learning Tools.
heading ’ll find entry called Container Manager (CMGR Coursework Containers).
status shows something Operational, means known incident containers. Use course discussion forum report issue.
status shows Operational, means system expected working. Check internet connection, try opening container different web browser, need , restart computer ensure fresh new connection. issue still persists, try restarting cotainer. Lastly, issue still unresolved, file ticket filling Qualtrics form . ’s imminent deadline, also consider posting course discussion forum.

heading: STA 198
text: Introduction Global Health Data Science (STA 198 / GLHLTH 298)Fall 2021, STA 198 taught Prof. Amy H. Herring.TAs course Alexandra Lawrence, Jackie Du, Eli Feder, Phuc Nguyen, Chris Yang.Go STA 198/GLHLTH 298 course website course specific information.
